CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 13, 1950, pg. 2 reads: "Guilty In Death - Milton Kendricks Jr. (right), chats amiably in halls of Criminal Court with his father Milton Sr., during a recess in his involuntary manslaughter trial before Judge Russell Adams Tuesday. He was found guilty. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Milton Kendricks Sr., left, talking to son Milton Kendricks Jr. during recess in involuntary manslaughter trial, standing in hallway of Allegheny County Courthouse
